title: [Obsidian Acropolis, Propylaeum]
description: An extensive marbled obsidian stairway snakes its way up the sloping hillside before coming to an abrupt plateau peaked with spiraling pillars of chiseled obsidian.  Atop the prominence, an imposing gatehouse adjoins the colonnade and a massive exterior wall decorated with elaborate jade blind arcading.

An extensive marbled obsidian stairway snakes its way up the sloping hillside before coming to an abrupt plateau peaked with spiraling pillars of chiseled obsidian.  Atop the prominence, an imposing gatehouse adjoins the colonnade and a massive exterior wall decorated with elaborate jade blind arcading that radiates a pale phosphorescent glow.
